nodes.text: Star Wars Battlefront Strategy Guide is a strategy guide companion for the canon video game Star Wars Battlefront. It details the game's characters, vehicles, locations, and game modes, and it also provides other tips and statistics.

The book was written by Dan Herrera and Michael Owen, and it was published by Prima Games alongside Star Wars Battlefront on November 17, 2015. A hardcover Collector's Edition was also published, which included an exclusive lithograph set. Both editions of the guide included access to a web-based eGuide, which could also be purchased separately.
Dominate battle with expert strategies for multiplayer matches and co-op play.
Learn about the best uses for every weapon and vehicle in the game.
Earn every Achievement/Trophy with our thorough coverage.
Free mobile-friendly eGuide! Includes a code to access the eGuide, a digital version of the complete strategy guide optimized for a second-screen experience.
